data.meta_description: Shah Rukh Khan & Deepika Padukone recently broke the internet with the first song from Pathaan titled Besharam Rang. Now, the makers are all set to drop the second song titled Jhoome Jo Pathaan which will release on December 22, 2022. Here’s all you need to know about the Pathaan title track.
data.text:
The hype around Siddharth Anand’s Pathaan starring Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone & John Abraham is unparalleled and unimaginable.

Last week, the makers released the first song titled Besharam Rang which went viral in no time and broke the internet.

It seems the chemistry between Shah Rukh & Deepika was too hot to handle for many.

Now, amid the Besharam Rang row, the makers are all set to release the film’s second song titled Jhoome Jo Pathaan.

The song will be out on December 22, 2022, and the makers have treated the fans with a new still featuring Shah Rukh & Deepika that has taken over the internet.

Further sharing the details about the song that will finally feature Shah Rukh Khan shaking a leg, Siddharth Anand told Pinkvilla, “Jhoome Jo Pathaan is an ode to the spirit of Pathaan, played by the inimitable Shah Rukh Khan. The song embodies the personality traits of this super spy Pathaan who has irresistible swagger that is infectious. His energy, his vibe, his confidence can make anyone dance to tunes.”

He further said, “It has been a while since we have seen SRK grove to the music and we are hoping that people will love seeing their favourite superstar shake a leg with an attitude to kill for” adding that the Vishal-Sheykhar song will be a modern fusion Qawaali.

Besides Shah Rukh Khan, the song also features Deepika and Siddharth said she is “looking a million bucks”. He concluded, “Their combination is electrifying on screen and this song is a treat for everyone across the world who love SRK and Deepika as their favourite on-screen pair”.

Reacting to the news and the new still, one fan wrote, “The 2nd song from #Pathaan called “Jhoome Jo Pathaan” out in just 2 days i.e 22nd Dec. Iss bar kya bawaal hoga wo dekhna bhi interesting hoga #JHOOMEJOPATHAAN #ShahRukhKhan #DeepikaPadukone”.

Another fan wrote, “Can't wait to see some SRK dance moves #JhoomeJoPathaan”.

The film releases in theatres on January 25, 2023.
